name: Johan
comment: For the price, I will use this Estwing 3LB Sledge for very light jobs. Made in Taiwan, did not do my research. First tipoff was when received. Estwing logo on handle has a Non USA font. Second tipoff is that it is not solid shank but a glued on head. But for the price, good for light applications. Also ordered the Estwing 3LB solid shank, which is obviously more money but is made in the States with typical Estwing USA design.
